Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Quick way to store db connection details out of sources.

  import configdb
  import ooop
  ooop.OOOP( configdb.configdb(required="user pwd dbname") )

By default, attributes are taken from a YAML file at system
defined user configuration location. From the key (profile) 'default'.
If the file is not there, it is created with a yaml file
with null values. You have to fill them.

To change the profile you can use the 'profile' keyword or
`DBCONFIG_PROFILE` environ.


https://github.com/vokimon/python-configdb

info.name: configdb
info.summary: Quick way to store db connection details out of sources
info.html_description:
Quick way to store db connection details out of sources.

import configdb import ooop ooop.OOOP( configdb.configdb(required=”user pwd dbname”) )

By default, attributes are taken from a YAML file at system defined user configuration location. From the key (profile) ‘default’. If the file is not there, it is created with a yaml file with null values. You have to fill them.

To change the profile you can use the ‘profile’ keyword or DBCONFIG_PROFILE environ.

https://github.com/vokimon/python-configdb
